snippet.title: The Raven - Teaser Trailer from Gamescom 2012
snippet.description:
The first teaser to this great adventure of the next generation from KING Art: The Raven - Legacy of a master thief.

Visit www.raven-game.com for more information. There is still a lot to discover!
